rooms.description: Entrance area with a reception and corridor leading to various functional spaces
Open living space designed as a combined dining and living area, featuring Vastu-compliant placement on the east side for prosperity and energy flow. Incorporates natural lighting with large windows.
Separate area within the living room partitioned by a folding door for flexible dining arrangements.
Dedicated home office space in a quiet corner on the north side to enhance focus and productivity. Includes built-in storage and Vastu-aligned positioning.
Compact but functional kitchen located near the dining area with proper ventilation and water drainage system; placed in accordance with Vastu principles for health and prosperity.

openings.description: Main entrance door, aligned to the east according to Vastu guidelines. Provides secure entry with a vestibule.
Spacious balcony adjacent to the first bedroom for relaxation and natural light exposure, designed on the west side as per Vastu recommendations.
Balcony accompanying the second bedroom on the ground floor, placed with an optimal view and alignment with local building norms.
